code: import React from'react';import"./range-slider.css";var getPercentage=function getPercentage(current,max){return 100*current/max;};var getLeft=function getLeft(percentage){return"calc(".concat(percentage,"% - 5px)");};function RangeSlider(){var sliderRef=React.useRef();var thumbRef=React.useRef();var diff=React.useRef();var handleMouseMove=function handleMouseMove(event){var newX=event.clientX-diff.current-sliderRef.current.getBoundingClientRect().left;var end=sliderRef.current.offsetWidth-thumbRef.current.offsetWidth;var start=0;if(newX<start){newX=0;}if(newX>end){newX=end;}var newPercentage=getPercentage(newX,end);thumbRef.current.style.left=getLeft(newPercentage);};var handleMouseUp=function handleMouseUp(){document.removeEventListener('mouseup',handleMouseUp);document.removeEventListener('mousemove',handleMouseMove);};var handleMouseDown=function handleMouseDown(event){diff.current=event.clientX-thumbRef.current.getBoundingClientRect().left;document.addEventListener('mousemove',handleMouseMove);document.addEventListener('mouseup',handleMouseUp);};return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"slider-cont"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"slider",ref:sliderRef},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"slider-thumb",ref:thumbRef,onMouseDown:handleMouseDown})),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"slider-label-container"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("h1",{className:"slider-left-label"},"6AM"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("h1",{className:"slider-right-label"},"6AM")));};export default RangeSlider;
